body: Hi Tim, You can pass a list to legend parameters if you have more than one graph. [Here](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Customize_weather_data_visualization_with_3D_Chart&slide=0&scale=2.5198419576493336&offset=-1044.8913458839168,-430.25775919829107) is an example.
